name: Notify Rob
info:
## Required Inputs

- `msg.payload`
    The message of the notification, supports a few html tags

## Optional Inputs

- `msg.topic`
    This will be used as the title of the notifcation if Title is not set
- `msg.image`
    The URL of the image in notification. Local file path or http(s) url
- `msg.url`
    Can add an url to your notification
- `msg.url_title`
    Can set the title of the url
- `msg.priority`
    -2/-1/1/2. Default: 0 (normal)
    If the priority is 2 (emergency), you should provide msg.retry and msg.expire.
    see explains
- `msg.device`
    Default for all device if not provided. Seprated by a comma
- `msg.sound`
    Name of the notification sound, see the list
- `msg.timestamp`
    An unix timestamp to specific the date time of your notification

name: My Zone Active
info:
Zone Active
 
ZA is a contact and motion sensor aggregator. 

It will transmit the active message when a motion sensor goes active or when a contact sensor changes state. 

 After a configurable delay, it will transmit a  deactivated message.
 
 Contact sensors are considered disabled after the "sensor reset delay " elapsed time passes. 
 
 Sensor reset delay and activity reset delay are in seconds.

name: Keeps a count of what doors are open or closed.
Shut off HVAC when doors are open
Count motion events and transmit both enabled and disabled messages
When a device is turned on, check if it's a CT bulb
When the CT target is updated, pull and update all active bulbs
y = (x/59450)^2 + 0.5
open door tally
Disable HVAC based on exterior doors

rules.to: (	   payload.openCount = 1 ? "The " & payload.openDoors[0] & " door is open," : "The doors are open,"	) & " HVAC will shut off in 2 minutes."

name: -> metrics
query:
INSERT INTO "public"."historical_metrics"
("name", "metric", "units", "data")
VALUES(
  '{{{ msg.payload.name }}}',
  '{{{ msg.payload.metric }}}',
  '{{{ msg.payload.unit }}}',
  {{{ msg.payload.data }}}
)

rules.to: /* 1 = heating	 * 2 = cooling	 * 0 = doing nonthing	 */	{	    "name": payload.displayName,	    "data": payload.value = "heating" ? 1 : 0,	    "unit": "hvac_activity",	    "metric": payload.name	}
/* 1 = heating	 * 2 = cooling	 * 0 = doing nonthing	 */	{	    "name": payload.displayName,	    "data": payload.value = "heating" ? 1 : 0,	    "unit": "hvac_activity",	    "metric": payload.name	}
/* 1 = heating	 * 2 = cooling	 * 0 = doing nonthing	 */	{	    "name": payload.displayName,	    "data": payload.value = "heating" ? 1 : 0,	    "unit": "hvac_activity",	    "metric": payload.name	}

/* 	 *		{	   "name":"power",	   "value":"1406",	   "displayName":"Shoffice Repeater Plug",	   "deviceId":"546",	   "descriptionText":"Shoffice Repeater Plug power is 1406W",	   "unit":"W",	   "type":null,	   "data":null	}	*/	{	   "name": payload.displayName,	   "data": payload.value,	   "unit": "watts",	   "metric": payload.name	}
